#id=1
#text=I have actually planted a few trees in my day .
#id=2
#text=I helped my mom plant a few fruit trees that she had bought .
#id=3
#text=Interestingly enough , we never leave them in the pot , but we never put them in the ground dirt either .
#id=4
#text=We start out by digging a pretty deep hole .
#id=5
#text=Depending on the size of the tree and the roots , its usually about a foot and a half deep and about a foot wide .
#id=6
#text=we then put soft planting soil in the bottom to make sure that the tree will have more nutrition .
#id=7
#text=My mom also has manure that she uses sometimes , but I let her handle that one .
#id=8
#text=After we have everything set up , we take the tree out of the pot , and gently spread out the roots to make sure they can grow with some more space .
#id=9
#text=Then we stick in in the hole , and put more dirt and whatever around it and gently pack it in .
#text=After all that , we find a stake of some sort and tie it next to the tree so it has something to keep it upright while it grows .
